text: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. I sigh in frustration every time. But it isn’t as if we have much choice. Whether Microsoft, Linux, or Mac – ever vendor moves things around. So:: embrace change! https://www.amazon.com/Who-Moved-My-Cheese-Mazing/dp/0091816971/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1IN7B927NCJMV %40smithcons.com
